HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Fixes: - Fixed a major bug with the static part mapper not including all of its static parts. (This mostly impacted animals.) - Reduced restrictions in surgery collections for animals/humanlikes
Fixes: - Fixed another few red errors, including the "Collection was modified" bug

Additions: - Added each stage to Health Condition stats page - Added more severity stats to Health Condition stats page Fixes: - Fixed red error during the cleanup phase Tweaks: - Added several additional categories to Health Condition type - Added debug timers to CleanupSurgeryRecipes - Added Rocketman to loading rules

Fixes: - Fixed false red error for "Remove hand talon" on startup - Optimized body part matching to be much quicker for very large pawn sets - Removed RoM:Vampires' blood extraction operations from modded surgery patch list. (Vampires shouldn't drink coolant or other weird non-human blood types.) Tweaks: - Fixed a minor inaccuracy with debug timers

Additions: - Added a bunch of stats for surgery, hediffs, and body part info cards - Added support for several more modded surgery types Fixes: - Fixed a few more NREs (red errors) - Vanilla removal/change implant surgeries will patched
Fixes: - Added official version tags for RimWorld v1.2! - Added compatibility with Harpy surgeries - Added "mandible" to the static part group

Additions: - Added hyperlinks to surgeries that don't have them Fixes: - Surgery duplication cleanup no longer removes similar recipes that target different removal hediffs (such as Cyber Fauna's "Heal body part" option) - Now patches surgeries that target all body parts (such as Cyber Fauna's "Heal body part" option) - Added brains to the static part group to strengthen part boundary checks

Additions: - Added compatibility for Torso/Body and Wing/Elytra surgeries Fixes: - Tightened up part group boundary checks to filter out more cases of badly-mapped surgeries - Cut part-to-part mapping time in half

Additions: - Added compatibility for a lot more special modded surgeries (EPOE-Forked, Android Tiers, MSE2, Questionable Ethics) Fixes: - Fixed issue where RoM's Druid Regrowth surgery operation would pollute the part mapper, causing way more surgery-to-limb connections than necessary for other operations (installing a foot in an eye, for example) - Optimized injections to run much faster, even with extreme pawn-to-surgery combinations - Added fingers and toes to static part group Tweaks: - Added timers and debug lines to each loop of the injection process - Added config to display those extra lines (was previously a hard-coded toggle)

Additions: - Added cleanup for hand/foot surgeries on humanlikes Fixes: - Fixed cleanup issue with Synthetic Heart surgery in EPOE Forked - Fixed "Mech-like Surgeries → Humanlikes" option to work on the patching operation its tied to
Additions: - Recompiled for RimWorld v1.1! - Added Humanlike → Mechs and Mech-like → Humanlike surgery patching. Use at your own risk!
Fixes: - Fixed patch crashes from certain pawn kinds

Fixes: - Better support for certain pawn kinds - Force a refresh the surgery operations cache, which earlier mods might have activated prematurely Tweaks: - Added a few more body part keywords and adjectives to the static mapper list

Additions: - Expanded patching to include removal operations and certain "special" operations from a few different mods - All surgeries are now sorted after patching Fixes: - Fixed a bug in animal surgery identification that blocked many animal surgery additions - Patching is now much more optimized, even for large amounts of surgeries and pawn types - The "part-to-part" mapper is primed with a static part group list to help identify certain animal parts Tweaks: - Added timers to injection debug lines
